other_tests.findings: Successful amplification of CYP11B exons indicated the presence of a hybrid gene in the patient.
Confirmed diagnosis of 11b-hydroxylase deficiency with elevated 11-deoxycortisol (638 nmol/L) and androstenedione (125 nmol/L), and undetectable PRA and aldosterone.

other_tests.procedure_name: Hybrid gene expression in COS-1 cells
other_tests.findings: The mutant complementary DNA had near-normal aldosterone synthase activity and was capable of converting 11-deoxycortisol to cortisol.
Presence of a single hybrid gene in homozygous form with deletion of normal copies of CYP11B1 and CYP11B2.
